title: Himi 267
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
Ko e Hifo mahu’inga
‘A Sīsū Kalaisi,
Ko hotau mo’ui’anga,
‘I he’etau hia.
2.
Na’e ‘atu tu’o taha,
‘I he funga ‘akau,
Ko e hifo mahu’inga,
Ki hotau ‘Otua.;
3.
Pea na’e pekia ai,
‘I he fuu mamahi,
‘I he’ene ‘ofa lahi,
Kia kitautolu.
4.
Pea ‘oku ‘aonga ma’u pē,
Tuku fakaholo
‘A e totongi ‘a Sīsū,
‘I he’etau hia.
5.
He ko hotau hoko’anga,
Ki hotau ‘Otua,
Ko e tui kia Sīsū,
Mo hono ta’ata’a. *
